The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 24 August is 282,215 (501.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 20 August, there were 6,074 new confirmed cases (10.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 13 August, there were 6,702 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 9% (628 fewer cases).
